name: NPC Quest (KellyGameDev)
description:
This month has been crazy. I have a 3 month old baby. I'm back at work full time. And I decided, hey, this would be a great month to do a FULL RPG!! I even joined this jam two weeks late because I was wrapping up a January jam. I built half this game one handed because I was holding a sleeping baby. I gave up on this game so many times. So if this game is at all playable it's a miracle.

When I wanted to give up I just told myself not to give up until the deadline. Always keep a glimmer of hope that I can pull through. If I am able to finish this game, there is no reason I can't do anything I put my mind to.
